name: Fight Kult
description:
4 mighty priests of devil’s church are convened by Satan to accomplish the FIGHT KULT ritual.

In this practice priest are forced to pray and to butcher themselves in order to be the only one remaining.

To survive to this bloody mass, the summoners have to pray in order to be judged by Satan and to be rewarded for their faith.

With the Evil as judge the priests will prove their devotion to dark lord in slaughtering themselves.

But beware if all survive, a sacrifice must be made.

Fight Kult is a 4 local player game. You’re alone, not a problem, an AI has been added.

Fight Kult is composed of 2 phases. The first one is the summon time. Quick time events to invoke evil’s power and be granted of powerful weapons. Once the weapons acquired the fight begins with a small amount of time and life. If nobody has been sacrificed within 30 seconds a sacrifice must be made. A random player will be sacrificed.

This game has to be played with a keyboard and controllers or only controllers:

Brawl

##############

Summon time:

##############

Keyboard:

WASD

K = X,

O = Y,

L = A,

P = B

Controllers:

Arrows are done with D-Pad

A = A Button (lower first button)

B = B Button (lower second button)

X = X Button (upper first button)

Y = Y Button (upper second button)

##############

Fight time:

##############

Keyboard:

WASD

Space = Jump,

Left Mouse Click = Hit,

Right Mouse Click = Shield

Controllers:

Left Stick to MOVE

A = Jump (lower first button)

X = Hit (upper first button)

Y = Shield (upper second button)
